q1: I really believe in this team
a1: I think they will play well at the UEFA Euro.
q2: Did they do well in this year's world cup?
a2: Yes, they made it to final but lost to France. It was their best ever achievement.
q3: What was Croatia win/ loss last season?
a3: Croatia played against Iceland in round trips, drew 0 - 0 in Reykjavik and won 2-0 in Zagreb, thus obtaining the qualification for Brazil 2014..
q4: How strong of a team is Croatia in comparison to others?
